game_description: "Highline" is an immersive slackline sim with narrative elements. You play as Olivia, a professional slackliner who was about to beat the world record when a terrible accident happened. Keep your balance slacklining while trying to find your way out of Limbo. Discover a brand new mechanic designed exclusively for VR. Use your whole body to walk through vertiginous lines in a unique surreal environment.
review_1: Its a very nice exciting game! I only played The climb like this before! Hope I can keep balance by my hand and feet not only my head in the update and do not give up the quest1 user it should be works good in this contents I think.
review_2: I love this idea! But the walking mechanics using the analog sticks is way incredibly hard and not fun!
review_3: Nice graphics, challenging, frustrating but that's the whole challenge. Great job and thank you dev for a great free game.
